Summary: It was a big fireball blue at the front orange at the back of the craft.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was rideing the skoolbus and i was looking out the window at a bank and then i saw it i thoght it was like a crashing plain but it made no nouse and it aperd out of noware and i looked at it for like 10-13 secs and it went behind the bank and i lost sight of it i felt relly scerd of it and it had blue flame at the front and red at the back of the craft thare was no metle to it it was made all out of flame and it was amazeing i cant explane it
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dripping Springs
